name: Tantum
description:
Yes.

it's not much but it's honest work !

It's my very first game (Prototype actually), be indulgent but honest. If the gameplay or graphics or anything else you want tell there is the comment section. and most importantly : 

THANKS FOR TRY IT !

Control (Sorry....I don't have build the control management yet)

-ZQSD = Move (I'm french ^-^')

-Space = Jump (You can Double Jump)

-Click Left = Shoot

-Click Right = Teleportation (If unlock)

If you want to talk about the game, come on DISCORD.
